name: INDIAN NGOs NETWORK (INN)
briefDescription: INN is a registered non-profit organisation. It serves for the development of deprived people in all field in all over India in co-ordination with more than 10,000 NGOs (Non-profit organisations), since 1997 and formally register by 2011 (Regd.No.725/2011). Registered under Income Tax Act, u/s.12AA, 80G and PAN: AAATI9469H. The network INN has been structured as National, Zonal (North, East, West and South), State, and District level Committees.  All interested NGOs will become member of District Committee, the Secretary of District Committee will become member of State Committee, the Secretary of State Committee will become member of Zonal Committee and the Secretary of the Zonal Committee will become member of National Committee.
